title: What is the most significant technology that had the greatest benefit to humans in the last 100 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: Haber chemical process. It manufactures amoniac out of the atmosfere.  Ammonia is used to manufacture fertilizer that enable the earth to grow more food. More food = more people. Makes the genetic manipulation of wheat, corn, rice possible due to repeated fertility maintained in the ground. Earth cannot carry more than 2.5 billion people without this process. (Ido stand to be corrected) Multhus did the first studies.

Either the internet or smart phones. Your phone through the internet, has more knowledge in it than all the written works throughout history. That is because it has those works all available to it. Access to knowledge is the biggest benefit for humans since forever. Alphabets, teaching people to read and write, writing books, the printing press, mobile devices and the internet, all of those are the most important inventions through out history.
